full_name: Scenario III: Return to The Devourer Below

steps.text: Put the Main Path location into play. Shuffle the 10 copies of Arkham Woods, choose 4 of them at random, and put them into play without looking at their revealed sides. Remove the other 6 from the game. Each investigator begins play at the Main Path.
Set the Ritual Site and Umôrdhoth cards aside, out of play. Flip over the "Return to The Devourer Below" scenario card and attach it to Umôrdhoth
